thread.title: China plays it safe for Women's Day

title: China plays it safe for Women's Day
text:
China plays it safe for Women's Day 10:42am GMT - 01:49 
Retailers in China are urging women to celebrate International Women’s Day with a shopping spree. But activists say the country should be using the occasion to talk about problems like sexual harassment. Reuters’ Anita Li reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Retailers in China are urging women to celebrate International Women’s Day with a shopping spree. But activists say the country should be using the occasion to talk about problems like sexual harassment. Reuters’ Anita Li reports.
